{{CharacterSystemTabs}}
Characters' base [[HP]], [[ATK]] and [[DEF]] are determined by '''base values''', '''level multipliers''' and '''ascension values'''.

For their bonus attributes, values are determined by '''base values''' and the '''ascension multiplier'''.

Values in tables are rounded, but the actual values used in the game are decimals with more digits, so using these values to calculate will often result in some small rounding error.

==Base Stats==
For calculations,

<math>\text{Stat Value} = \text{Base Value} \times \text{Level Multiplier} + \text{Ascension Value}</math>

===Base Value===
Different characters have different base values for base attributes.

Alternatively, the multiplier can be derived from the following formulas:

<math>\text{Level Multiplier}_\text{Base} = 1 + {\sim9.17431-1\over100-1} \times (\text{Level} - 1)</math>

<math>\text{Level Multiplier}_\text{4-Star} = \text{round}(\text{Level Multiplier}_\text{Base},3)</math>

<math>\text{Level Multiplier}_\text{5-Star} = \text{round}(\text{Level Multiplier}_\text{Base}+(\sim-0.00168+\sim0.0000748163\times(\sim0.761486\times(\sim5.11365+\text{Level}))^2),3)</math>

Where <math>\text{round}(,3)</math> means rounding to 3 decimal places.

===Ascension Value===
<math>\text{Ascension Value} = \text{Max Ascension Value} \times \text{Ascension Multiplier}</math>

====Ascension Multiplier====
{| class="fandom-table"
! Ascension Phase !! 0 !! 1 !! 2 !! 3 !! 4 !! 5 !! 6
|-
! Multiplier
| <math>{0\over182}</math> || <math>{38\over182}</math> || <math>{65\over182}</math> || <math>{101\over182}</math> || <math>{128\over182}</math> || <math>{155\over182}</math> || <math>{182\over182}</math>
|}

==Bonus Attribute==
For calculations,

<math>\text{Bonus Attribute Value} = \text{Base Value} \times \text{Ascension Multiplier}</math>

===Base Value===
Different characters have different stats and base values of bonus attributes.

===Ascension Multiplier===
For bonus attributes, values will increase in ascension phases 2/3/5/6.
